thread.section_title: PurpleTag.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PurpleTag.ie | purpletag.ie
thread.title: Gillian Clark

author: Gillian Clark
title: Gillian Clark
text: This is the first time I've used Purple Tag and I found it a wonderful experience. I couldn't initially find what I wanted, they made suggestions and found me my perfect shoes. They were delivered less than 24 hours later, the box was tied with a purple ribbon and a little pack of jellies included! Free delivery and free returns too! I've already chosen my next 2 purchases, just need to convince hubby that I need more new shoes!!
